short_summary: Supply, delivery, and installation of an Electro Magnetic Interference (EMI) cancellation system

duration_in_months: The contract period will be from date of award to March 31st, 2024 = 13 months (depending on the date of the award)},//
full_summary:
================

###  A ElectroMagnetic Field Compensation System Tender

#### Solicitation Number: WS3677589548
#### Publication Date: January 13, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: January 31, 2023, 14:00 MST
#### Scheduled Contract Start Date: February 2, 2023
#### Scheduled Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) / Conseil national de recherches du Canada (CNRC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the supply, delivery, and installation of an ElectroMagnetic Field Compensation System.

### Background

The NRC has a requirement for a Electro Magnetic Interference (EMI) cancellation system for an Apreo 2 Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM). The system must be delivered before or on March 31, 2023 to 4250 Wesbrook Mall, Vancouver, BC.

### Evaluation Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the lowest responsive bid that meets the mandatory criteria. Respondents are encouraged to provide comments, concerns, or recommendations by submitting an email to the Procurement Authority.

### Contract Terms

A contract will be awarded for a period of 14 months, from the date of award to March 31st, 2024. The system is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). A preference will be given to Canadian goods.

### Mandatory Requirements

*   The system must be compatible with the existing Apreo 2 Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) and must be delivered and installed before or on March 31, 2023
*   The contract period will be 14 months, from the date of award to March 31st, 2024

### Contact Information

*   Thomas Leboeuf, PSPC/SPAC, thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, (613) 421-4705. 

### Request for Proposal Documents

For full details, please visit the procurement notice on Ariba Discovery at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15126991?extsite=MTUxMjY5OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://
